stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain': 0.5, 'no rain': 0.5} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {'rain': 0.1, 'no rain': 0.9}

lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {0:1.0} if weather_outcome == 'no rain' and carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' else ({-2:1.0} if weather_outcome == 'no rain' and carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' else ({-10:0.99,0:0.01} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' else {-2:0.99,-10:0.01}))
